Alas, for me the evolution & revolution of the #KitaJagaKita & #RakyatJagaRakyat hashtags was something removed from the pandemic. It was during the devastating Dec 2021 floods in Klang Valley. 1 year & 9 months after the pandemic was first announced - #KitaJagaKita trended again

Then a new # emerged: #RakyatJagaRakyat. It’s more specific. This new # removes ambiguity of who the active players are in the role to look after Msians. It's the *rakyat* helping the *rakyat*. It unambiguously points to the (alleged) inaction of the Malaysian government.
